channel.title: Automatic Updating
channel.description: I have a question about the current way mods and server wrappers are made. Why do the developers of these things decompile, fix errors generated due to obfuscation, copy/paste their code, and things of the like? In my opinion, they could easily just use the same principles that RS Bots used (using BCEL to identify classes, inject wrapper methods, etc) to simplify the process. It might be slightly more work to write the updater for their specific mod, but the future maintenance will be far less, or potentially 0.
